title: FT: EPDGs Available! Looking for trading partners for EPDGs. - CLOSED
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT: EPDGs Available! Looking for trading partners for EPDGs. - CLOSED
posts.post_content:
Have this small group of EPDGs available for trade. Currently upgrading my set and have about 100 that I’d like to convert from SGC or raw to PSA. I also have these dupes below available.

If you have EPDGs in a PSA slab and are willing to talk trades, please let me know!  I can bundle also, cash either way, whatever is fair. I’m available via PM. 

Don’t be shy! Hahaha

Thanks
Jeff

NO LONGER AVAILABLE:
Blackburne, Barger, Freeman, Gray
